title: Subway Tile Backsplashes, Pet-Friendly Community
posting_body: ['NOW LEASING!', 'FREMONT9', 'Time to stop looking and start moving!', 'Located in the heart of the quirky, vibrant goodness that is downtown Las Vegas, Fremont9 is an apartment community that knows how to work hard and play even harder.', 'Settle in, this is going to be fun.', "Of course, we have the standards like stainless appliances, quartz countertop, and wood-style plank, but you'll flip for the more unexpected details in our floor plans.", 'Think gas appliances, LED under-cabinet lighting', 'and', 'oh so much more.', "You can't fake this kind of cool.", 'Two steps to your right?', 'Legendary Atomic Liquors.', 'A block to your left?', 'The Container Park filled with goodness.', 'A hop, skip and jump in either direction?', 'Dog parks.', "The world's best barista.", 'Craft everything.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 93', 'OR Text', '93', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 525 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Contemporary Flat-Panel Cabinets With LED Lighting', '- Subway Tile Backsplashes', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Modern Floor Plans', '- Wood-Style Plank Flooring', '- Washer/Dryer', '- Natural Gas and Energy Star® Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Pet-Friendly Community', 'Community Amenities', '- Resort-Style Pool and Spa', '- Clubroom Lounge with Billiards and Music Wall', '- TopBrewer App-Powered Espresso Machine', '- BBQ Grills', '- 24/7 On-Demand Parcel Lockers', '- Chic Spaces with Handpainted Murals and Blackened Steel Accents', '- 24-Hour Fitness Center with Reclaimed Gym Floors', '- Fully-Equipped Conference Room', '- Media Lounge with Video Wall', '- Entertainment Kitchen and Community Dining Space', '- Yoga and Spin Studio', '- Outdoor Courtyards with Ping Pong and Fire Pits', '- Bicycle Storage', 'Pet Policy', 'Maximum of two pets allowed per apartment.', 'A one-time fee of $350 will be charged in addition to pet rent of $35 per month, per pet.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Call for details.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-7:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Fremont9', '901 Fremont Street, Las Vegas, NV, 89101', 'CK0XSWMU3MEl']
